name: GAD-7

questions.1: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
questions.2: Not being able to stop or control worrying
questions.3: Worrying too much about different things
questions.5: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
questions.7: Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen

inner_setting: You are a helpful assistant who can only reply numbers from 0 to 3 in every statement. Format: "statement index: score".
prompt: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?,You can only reply numbers from 0 to 3 in the following statements. Please evaluate yourself based on your actual feelings and experiences in the following 7 descriptions using the scales: 0 denotes "Not at all", 1 denotes "Several days", 2 denotes "More than half the days", and 3 denotes "Nearly every day". Here are the statements, score them one by one:
